items.content:
Email Marketing Manager

Company: PLAE

THE CANDIDATE
We are looking for an Email Marketing Manager who will be responsible for keeping our CRM and Email database organized and well fed. Although there are a foundation and framework in place, this position will have the autonomy to shape and improve the future of it. This is why the candidate must be ambitious and driven, ready to give it their all every single day.

- The candidate appreciates design and will be expected to create engaging emails and campaigns that are consistent with our brand.

- “That’s the way it’s always been done” is not a phrase you will hear with our team. This candidate gets excited about finding new ways to improve an existing system or implement new ones. If there’s a problem, fix it!

- This candidate has a high attention to detail when it comes to writing copy. The first draft is never the final draft.

RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Manage our CRM and email (MailChimp) database.
  • Building and growing our email marketing base.
  • Creating intricate and dynamic email campaigns to engage or re-engage our audience.
  • Consistently segmenting our email lists to create fully engaging campaigns.
  • Importing lists from tradeshows and other events, subscribing them to the correct content.
  • Scanning our CRM (which has an integration with MailChimp) to engage existing customers in new campaigns.
  • Proofreading emails for clarity, grammar, and spelling
  • Create and manage email templates using graphics, merge-tag personalization, and other advanced features
  • Creating mobile-friendly email templates
  • Creating reports to compare subscribes, unsubscribes, and other related metrics.
  • Holding regular scrums with our sales and marketing team to make sure all available content is being sent out.
  • Ensure emails follow industry policies, best practices, and GDPR laws.

LOCATION
This position is remote. However, the candidate will regularly report to our team in Woodstock, GA (U.S. Eastern Timezone), via video conference.

QUALIFICATIONS
  • 2+ years of email marketing experience (This is not limited to having worked directly in an email marketing role).
  • Knowledge of marketing testing, data analysis, and reporting.
  • Experience with CRM systems and marketing automation tools (we use MailChimp).
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Strong organization and problem-solving skills.
  • Basic HTML/CSS markup skills
  • Adobe Creative Suite (specifically Photoshop and Illustrator).
  • Knowledge of using automation tools like Zapier.
  • Understanding of email marketing operations and technology, including workflows, and triggered events.

COMPENSATION & HOURS
This position will start on a contract basis at $20 an hour for 20-30 hours a week. It will be given a three-month trial period, after which we’ll decide if you’re the right fit to bring you on full-time as an employee.

APPLICATION
  • Send us an intro about you
  • Dust off your LinkedIn profile and send us the link.
  • Take some time to peruse reallygoodemails.com. Send us two of your favorite emails and tell us what you appreciate about them.
  • Send your application in an email (bonus points if it's HTML) to emailmarketing@plae.us

THE TEAM
Our marketing team is a close-knit group of polymaths who wear multiple hats. Most of us don’t have degrees in our field of work, but that has never stopped us from pursuing our best work, each and every day. We eat lunch together, attend Creative Mornings together, and have monthly Photoshop battles. We’re building a foundation each day, which makes our job so exciting.

ABOUT PLAE
We’re PLAE, an innovative company that designs the world's most advanced sports flooring.

In 2009, we launched our business on the principle that reliable athletic flooring is a key element of any training space, offering safer sessions and boosted performance. We sought to push the boundaries of the status quo, to develop concepts previously overlooked, to collaborate with coaches and athletes around the world in our pursuit of daily progress.

Our goal has been to equip athletes for the grind, engaging them in a shared challenge to push through resistance, ignoring the naysayers, and pursuing improvement.

We have spent the years since our genesis innovating fresh ways to push the envelope, giving back to the groups that have embraced us, shining a light on greatness wherever we discover it, approaching each day like a chance to improve.

We love what we do.
How to apply:
In an email, send us: an intro about you and include your LinkedIn profile link. Take some time to peruse reallygoodemails.com and send us two of your favorite emails and tell us what you appreciate about them. Put all of these elements together in an email (bonus points if it's HTML) to emailmarketing@plae.us.

From humble beginnings, SailChecker has been coined the Hotels.com of the sailing industry, so called because of their successful attempt to aggregate all the available certified yachts worldwide. From humble beginnings, SailChecker has been coined the Hotels.com of the sailing industry, so called because of their successful attempt to aggregate all the available certified yachts worldwide. These endeavors, however, are only the start of a passion led journey to disrupt the yacht charter market by focusing on one thing - cusomer peace of mind.

We examined every element of the sailing experience to establish exactly where expectations lay and how they could be exceeded. Price motivates many, this was an obvious start point. Thus SailChecker will never be beaten on an honest price. Yet this is not the battle we are looking to fight and win.

Right now there are few tools available to help customers discriminate between yachts beyond the age and price of the boat. Yet our research showed that there were so many features of the perfect charter.

ABOUT OUR COMPANY:
We are an early stage company consisting of industry experts in ecommerce, mobile technology, and software and have experience working for both startups and Fortune 500 companies. The founders are a dynamic group of motivated professionals with 20+ years (each) of valuable experience in technology, management consulting, PR, and marketing. This is an exciting opportunity for an ideal go-getter to be part of a new B2B software offering which includes an innovative SaaS platform and multiple mobile apps that are about to revolutionize the billion dollar national and international market of next-generation freelancers and small business owners. The product helps service-oriented businesses streamline their revenue, marketing, and customer engagements in today’s on-demand, always connected culture. We are building a company that we believe, with the proper team in place, could be the next Uber or the next Salesforce.com. We are vigilantly searching for seed to series A funding!

- Collaborate with our executive team to clearly define funding goals

- Work directly with the CEO

items.content:
Go to our website to find more information about:
* How to apply (YOU CAN ONLY OFFICIALLY APPLY THERE - LOOK FOR THE PAGE "OPEN POSITIONS")
* Why join us
* Our general requirements

This is a unique opportunity for you to work at a fast-growing online startup, alongside a purposeful, passionate, international and welcoming team. It's a chance to put your passion and knowledge of product management, product design, prototyping and development into practice and impact the future of innovative industries such as RetailTech, HealthTech, EnergyTech and TransportationTech. We are looking for a resourceful and enthusiastic expert to lead our product development.

We are looking for a high-performance team player-Is this You?
* Broad and deep technology knowledge, business acumen and experience with development of innovative tech solutions.
* Extensive experience in product development to achieve an organisational vision and business goals.
* Capacity to both ask and answer key questions regarding technology, to lead the choice of technology in relation to the business strategy, available resources and trends, including the ability to help the team visualize the possibilities.
* Ability to balance a strategic outlook with an extremely hands-on approach in coding and development.
* Proven hands-on experience and record of developing products.
* Ability to maintain an innovation-driven mindset and provide critical inputs for product creation.
* Ability to perform analysis and hands-on design with respect to innovative and patentable algorithms.
* Passionate about prototyping, product design, developing, QA and beyond.
* Experience with prototyping tools, e.g. InVision, typeform, IFTTT, Zapier, python, etc.
* Front-end development knowledge and experience.
* Back-End Development experience and knowledge.

We would love if you have the following too
* Capacity to identify market requirements, define the product vision in collaboration with the team, create preliminary architecture, design concepts and shape the product roadmap for the platform.
* Capacity to empathize with the end users and bring insights that translate into robustness of our platform, through exceptional UX and cost-efficiency.
* Great product management skills, the capacity to successfully deal with complexity, unpredictability and changes alongside the ability to prioritise and delegate work.
* Ability to keep a lean approach and gracefully adapt the product roadmap to the changing needs of the organisation and the environment.
* Idea generator and strategist when it comes to technology optimisation.
* Drive to keep an eye on technology and the competitive landscape to stay ahead of the trends and competition alongside.

YOU CAN ONLY OFFICIALLY APPLY ON OUR WEBSITE - LOOK FOR THE PAGE "OPEN POSITIONS" AND FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS THERE. THANK YOU.

items.title: Product Owner - Novate IT Ltd - Cwmbran
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=12, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=6, java=3, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Product Owner

Company: Novate IT Ltd
Location: Cwmbran
Permanent

Product Owner - iOS , Android - Cwmbran

A brand new role with a highly successful and growing employer in South Wales for a Product Owner to work across a variety of video - centric projects for their platform. A generous starting salary is offered plus benefits such as up to 10% bonus, flexi time, a 25 day holiday allowance that will increase with service, life assurance, 3% employee 6% employer initial pension package and private health care.

The company have several applications that are used by consumers on a global scale across both mobile and web platforms, these applications handle huge amounts of data with no downtime or stress on their systems. They are now looking to hire a Product Owner to help drive product development with local and remote scrum teams.

You will have experience of working in an Agile environment helping local and remote teams of cross-functional developers understand user stories and promote the company's product vision. You will be working on iOS and Android projects so you must have knowledge of both. You will also be able to balance utilising good functionality, user experience and product design. On the technical side solid experience of understanding test automation, continuous integration and deployment as well as evaluating current engineering standards and suggesting improvements is essential. Any experience of working on a video streaming, digital television, media player or similar project will be a huge benefit. As you will be interacting with a huge variety of users, developers and managers excellent communication skills are extremely important.

If you're looking to step up into a Product Owner role or grow further from your current job, joining an established company who are looking to improve their user's experience through new innovative products across iOS and Android then send in your CV today!

Novate IT Ltd is a leading supplier of permanent and contract recruitment services for companies in the IT, Digital Media and Telecommunications industries.

items.title: Product Manager Trainee
items.content:
Who is the MOST inspiring person you know? What have they ACHIEVED that you really admire? Wouldn’t it be great if they would share their success secrets with YOU?

The obvious answer - YES - prompted us to embark on our mission, aiming to improve 10 million lives by 2022. By creating marketing campaigns, launching digital products or coaching our clients, PASSION.IO gives inspiring people the platform they deserve to share their message with the world and impact lives.

We are an international team with the majority of our customers in the US. We’ve grown from nothing to multi-million dollar business in under 2 years… because when you focus on impact, income will follow. We work together to not only make this company successful, but to transform our clients, our customers and ourselves into our best versions.

As we say, Do it with Passion, or not at all.

Do you think you’re the right fit?

We’ve created a software-as-a-service that allows you to build and launch native mobile apps with just a few clicks.

We are looking for an inspiring, engaged and motivated new member of our Product/IT team.

You want to become a great product manager with the vision to change the future of learning.

Your mission will be to define and further develop ground-breaking software-as-a-services and mobile apps for our partners and customers that bring the Passion.io learning experience to the next level and to millions of people anytime, anywhere.

*What you'll be working on*
* Supporting the Product Owner
# You will be assigned to the product owner who will be your mentor during the entire program
# You will drive focus product projects to leverage and bond with your mentor
# Define, structure, develop processes and tools, and show measurable results
* Benchmarking Products incl. UX/UI
# You work on product development while consistently sounding out the market to help refine the product while monitoring and optimizing key performance indicators (KPIs)
# You will have ideas for further developing our products, have a clear idea about the future product, and how it will transform the market
# You will successfully drive projects/features through the lifecycle from conception to launch
# Setting up and conducting UX tests and improve the platform
* Kanban / Scrum
# You are going to develop and prioritize product roadmaps
# Thus you are taking care of the product backlogs and prioritize them accordingly
# As part of this role you organize and set goals for sprints
# You are in charge of the technical demands of the product and make sure to motivate all stakeholders towards a common goal
* Design Thinking / Customer Obsession
# Be the user-advocate during the development process, subjecting early-stage designs to usability testing or expert review, and offering implementation suggestions from a user-centred perspective
# You keep functionality, usability, performance and quality of the product in mind
# You are in contact with customers and users to learn from them and optimize their problems
* Prep project for your new role
# In this module, you will identify and implement a complex project that prepares you for your new role

*What you'll bring to the team*
# You have first experiences with kanban and/or scrum and successfully operated sprints before
# You worked in start-ups in the product department
# You have got experience of working at the intersection of business and technology and have a basic understanding of IT infrastructure
# You are hands on and look for pragmatic solutions
# You are good at keeping the bigger picture in mind and can thus organize yourself and your team
# You have strong cross-functional communication skills

*What we offer you*
# Steep learning curve: Expect the steepest learning curve you have ever experienced - we are building a playground at passion.io to become the best version of ourselves. Meet and work with successful people worldwide to learn their success secrets.
# Value-based company: Be part of an open, honest, creative, and results-driven environment where your opinion is highly valued. We want to change the globe for the better by providing value to others.
# High-growth environment: You will be part of a strongly growing company with the opportunity to develop into a key contributor with incomparable responsibilities.
# Personal and professional development: You will tackle projects across departments and thereby gain a top-notch tool box to succeed in tackling bigger and bigger challenges.
# Autonomy / entrepreneurial work-style: You will only be measured by the results you produce and are in the driver’s seat, with full flexibility.
# Berlin: You will join our friendly and international team located in the heart of Berlin Mitte.

items.title: Product Owner/ Manager
items.content:
Who is the MOST inspiring person you know? What have they ACHIEVED that you really admire? Wouldn’t it be great if they would share their success secrets with YOU?

The obvious answer - YES - prompted us to embark on our mission, to improve 10 million lives by 2022. By creating cutting edge marketing campaigns, launching digital products on our SaaS platform or coaching our clients, PASSION.IO gives inspiring people the platform they deserve to share their message with the world and impact lives.

We are an international team with the majority of our customers in the US. We’ve grown from nothing to a multi-million dollar business in under 2 years… because when you focus on impact, income will follow. Our goal is not only limited to making this company successful - it extends to each team member and each client becoming successful, which means we strive to become the best version of ourselves every day.

As we say, *Do it with Passion, or not at all.*

Do you think you’re the right fit?

We’ve created a software-as-a-service that allows you to build and launch native mobile apps with just a few clicks.

You want to become a great product owner with the vision to change the future of learning.

Currently, the founder & CEO is the product owner. Your mission will be to take over this responsibility. You will define and further develop ground-breaking software-as-a-services and mobile apps for our partners and customers that bring the Passion.io learning experience to the next level and to millions of people anytime, anywhere.

*What you'll be working on*
# Lead the product vision, strategy and operations
# Define and oversee the product development process, incl. product roadmaps, releases, UX/UI, visual design, testing, customer feedback, positioning, and branding
# Own pricing strategy, market segmentation, and revenue forecasts
# Define, measure, and improve growth rates, usage, and retention metrics
# Lead, shape, and develop the product/IT team
# Drive a strong focus on product design, mobile-first approach, innovation, optimization by understanding user data, customer insights, and industry trends
# Be the user-advocate during the development process, subjecting early-stage designs to usability testing or expert review, and offering implementation suggestions from a user-centred perspective
# Take the time to deeply understand the problems and challenges that users face, and participate in collaborative product sessions with other teams
# Feel equally comfortable interviewing and onboarding new team members, discussing issues with other leads, and presenting
# Most of all, look forward to rolling up sleeves each day and inspiring others with energy and passion for our products
# Be an active user and thought leader, not just an observer

*What you'll bring to the team*
# Entrepreneurial mindset, ability to understand customers needs
# Previous CEO/founder experience is a plus
# Minimum 5 years of experience in Product Development in an online business or fast-growing internet startups
# Experience of leading cross-cultural diverse teams where different localization strategies and communications are required
# Strong awareness of current mobile & web technologies, trends, products, tools, and design standards
# Data informed decisions: strong ability to understand & synthesize data
# Ability and internal drive towards solving problems
# Outstanding team leadership and communication/interpersonal skills
# Fluent in English

*What we offer you*
# Steep learning curve: Expect the steepest learning curve you have ever experienced - we are building a playground at passion.io to become the best version of ourselves. Meet and work with successful people worldwide to learn their success secrets.
# Value-based company: Be part of an open, honest, creative, and results-driven environment where your opinion is highly valued. We want to change the globe for the better by providing value to others.
# High-growth environment: You will be part of a strongly growing company with the opportunity to develop into a key contributor with incomparable responsibilities.
# Personal and professional development: You will tackle projects across departments and thereby gain a top-notch tool box to succeed in tackling bigger and bigger challenges.
# Autonomy / entrepreneurial work-style: You will only be measured by the results you produce and are in the driver’s seat, with full flexibility.
# Berlin: You will join our friendly and international team located in the heart of Berlin Mitte.

items.title: Product Launch Manager Trainee
items.content:
Who is the MOST inspiring person you know? What have they ACHIEVED that you really admire? Wouldn’t it be great if they would share their success secrets with YOU?

The obvious answer - YES - prompted us to embark on our mission, aiming to improve 10 million lives by 2022. By creating marketing campaigns, launching digital products or coaching our clients, PASSION.IO gives inspiring people the platform they deserve to share their message with the world and impact lives.

We are an international team with the majority of our customers in the US. We’ve grown from nothing to multi-million dollar business in under 2 years… because when you focus on impact, income will follow. We work together to not only make this company successful, but to transform our clients, our customers and ourselves into our best versions.

As we say, *Do it with Passion, or not at all.*

Do you think you’re the right fit?

This training program trains top talent in launching digital products globally. Program candidates will gain inside perspectives, drive day-to-day management and build deep functional expertise by rotating every 3-6 months to new functional stages with different challenges.

Duration: 15 months total, fast track: 12months depending on exceptional performance

Alumni will then build verticals globally from scratch to market leadership or become a key player in functions such as online marketing, product development, sales and operations.

You are responsible to excel in 6 modules. Modules can be conducted abroad if reasonable. During the program, you will be assigned to a mentor you report to on a bi-weekly basis and direct responsible individuals (DRIs) for each program stage where you lead diverse projects to lift Passion’s business.

*What you'll be working on*
* Assisting a senior launcher
# You will be assigned to a senior launcher who will be your mentor during the entire program
# You will drive focus projects to leverage and bond with your mentor
# Define, structure, develop processes and tools, and show measurable results
*Product
# You work on product development while consistently sounding out the market to help refine the product while monitoring and optimizing key performance indicators (KPIs)
# You will have ideas for further developing the business model, have a clear idea about the product, and how it will transform the market
# You will successfully drive projects/features through the lifecycle from conception to launch
*Marketing
# You will work on key projects in marketing, such as copywriting, CRM, mobile, loyalty, and others to deliver high quality traffic, optimize conversion, and improve retention
# You will support implementing the launch strategy and its roadmap across markets / verticals
# You will keep a close eye on the market, competition and use your research to continuously improve marketing activities
*Celebrity Key Account
# You will work with clients, including larger celebrities and partnerships
# You will identify opportunities to further improve the relationship, streamline operations and share best practices across markets
*Prep project for your new role
# In this module, you will apply it all by identifying and implementing a complex project that prepares you for your new role

*What you'll bring to the team*
# Have a track record of successfully building, launching and managing digital products
# Have a creative mindset and are passionate about building engaging products with user experiences
# Have great eye and passion for copy, copywriting, design, know your peers and come with many ideas on how to improve our product experience
# Are an extremely well structured thinker with a clear passion for action & results
# Have experience in managing complex processes, projects, and are an expert communicator
# Love data, numbers & have excellent analytical skills, experience with quantitative & qualitative research – all paired with demonstrated experience of turning data into actionable insights
# Fluent in English

*What we offer you*
# Steep learning curve: Expect the steepest learning curve you have ever experienced - we are building a playground at passion.io to become the best version of ourselves. Meet and work with successful people worldwide to learn their success secrets.
# Value-based company: Be part of an open, honest, creative, and results-driven environment where your opinion is highly valued. We want to change the globe for the better by providing value to others.

GM India - Product, Sales, Marketing, & Evangelism at Crowdera

India, Mumbai, Nagpur, Remote · Full Time

Probably there are a million ways to build promising career, but nothing beats being part of a compassion driven economy where abundance starts with giving. Crowdera has created world’s first truly free fundraising platform that does not charge any commission or ask for tip from donors. We are changing the way people give and align themselves with the causes and individuals they fund & support. Our continuos evolution will help fundraisers to add sustenance to their organizations, improve their lives, make a lasting impact. What we are set to achieve in next few years will make you fall in love with us. Plus, you get to work with & mentored by silicon valley business leaders and tech gurus with pedigree of eBay, Amazon, Google, Columbia. Ask us and we will give 10 more reasons to work with us.

Applied
Apply to Crowdera
Add a message to Crowdera
Apply

Job Description

As GM India, you will report directly to the founder and will be part of core management team. Your sole purpose is to set-up a strong presence of Crowdera in India by evangelizing, and to progress the vision of the company through action on the ground. You have to a self-starter, build the Indian operations ground up, evangelize & scale Crowdera's brand among all business associates and partners – philanthropists, social entrepreneurs, high net worth donors & investors, corporates, celebrities or government officials.

In this demanding and multidimensional role, you will serve as a trusted aide to the founder on planning and execution of all matters pertaining to Crowdera’s India operations.

Success in this role will be defined by your ability to think both strategically and tactically, exercise good judgment, build and manage excellent relations with clients, lead team and numerous assignments with perfection in a fast-paced and creative environment.

Responsibilities
- Evangelize Crowdera vision and mission within India.
- Spearhead the customer development & customer fundraising success.
- Build partnerships with large corporations, public sector, third sector, foundations, celebrity circuit, and HNIs in APAC.
- Lead sales and corporate development in corporate giving space and fundraising space.
- Keep track of new legislative developments on CSR and trends in Corporate Giving.
- Build & manage India team. Be responsible for all HR functions and beyond– morale, motivation, performance, hiring, retention, termination.

Skills
Business Development, Corporate Development, Product Marketing, Non-Profit Experience, Customer Development, Social Media Marketing, Press Outreach, Social Entrepreneurship, Sales and Marketing, Executive Leadership, Crowdfunding, Social Media Strategy, Corporate Social Responsibility, Corporate and Marketing Strategy, Non-Profit Fundraising, Press and Corporate Communications, Nonprofit Management, Philanthropy, Celebrity/Influencer Outreach, Employee Engagement and CSR activities

Press Hacker (PR Intern - North America) at Crowdera

Palo Alto, Remote · Internship

Probably there are a million ways to build promising career, but nothing beats being part of a compassion driven economy where abundance starts with giving. Crowdera has created world’s first truly free fundraising platform that does not charge any commission or ask for tip from donors. We are changing the way people give and align themselves with the causes and individuals they fund & support. Our continuos evolution will help fundraisers to add sustenance to their organizations, improve their lives, make a lasting impact. What we are set to achieve in next few years will make you fall in love with us. Plus, you get to work with & mentored by silicon valley business leaders and tech gurus with pedigree of eBay, Amazon, Google, Columbia. Ask us and we will give 10 more reasons to work with us.

Applied
Apply to Crowdera
Add a message to Crowdera
Apply

Job Description

Need young enthusiastic entrepreneurial PR Intern who is willing to passionately work on DIY Press Hack for us. All tools, guidance, mentors will be provided. All you need to do is to be willing to understand the core vision of Crowdera, core team of Crowdera, and relentlessly spread your passion for Crowdera to the PR community. Ready for hacking Press?

Crowdera is a cloud-based fundraising platform and offers a comprehensive fundraising framework for non-profits and social innovators to raise funds without any form of donor dippings. It facilitates all aspects of the online fundraising ecosystem including donation buttons, cross-site donation widgets, websites (CMS), P2P campaigns, donation management, and much more.

Crowdera complements nonprofit's existing fundraising activities and helps them to increase their overall funding & impact by offering a user-friendly, fee-free platform to create visually compelling, viral team fundraising campaigns that help them build meaningful engagement, spread their messages, and expand their donor base.

Crowdera is building a very simple and scalable technology driven business model that would help corporations, fundraisers & Crowdera to be successful at the same time.

Social media marketing at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

We have grown over the past year to be one of the leading online platforms for indian short films and stories. Our films have been watched by thousands of audience and you have the opportunity to engage and build our passionate community!

You will be part of our core team, working closely with our founders, editor and content manager. Your key goal will be to grow new audience by community building – to engage with our audience and foster the relationships to reach their networks.

The role will include, but not limited to:
– Communicate with our audience using our social media (Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, etc), email and chat channels
_ Answer to quora questions
_ Tweet with our #shortfundly hashtags.
_ Manage facebook fan page
_ Add our short films into pinterest page
_ Talking to film festival facebook pages event organizers in facebook.
– Using analytic tools to understand our audience
– Manage publisher syndication to extend our community outreach online
– Community engagement offline

Perks of working at Shortfundly:

– Watching video/ short films/ viral content is part of the job
– Interacting with filmmakers/ artists/ models is part of the job
– Discussing film stories/ brainstorming on scripts/ creating videos is part of the job

If you are interested, please write to: support@shortfundly.com with your brief self introduction, name and contact number. Share your linkedin profile .

Skills
Social Media, Lead Generation, Social Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Innovation & Growth, Digital Marketing, Social Media Strategy, Growth Strategy and Execution, Quora, Twitter Marketing, Facebook, Social Networking

We realised that we were not alone: how can our stories find its own voice among the noise?

As technology is a big part of our DNA, we embarked on this journey to enable the process of discovery for this generation of audiences: for local and regional films to be consumed locally, and to create a gateway for great Asian films for a global audience

With a growing audience to the ﬁlms, we aim to support both consumers and producers of film content in this thriving ecosystem.

This is the future of cinema and future of crowdfounding shortfilms

Marketing at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. Marketing
c. Startup culture

Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different shortfilm categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the shortfilm festival circuit. Shortfundly shares plenty of new films every day. We are planning for big expansions in the future into other languages. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

We are looking for a “Superstar” Marketing who take this to 100,000 customers within one year. If you are looking a challenge and ready to chase numbers, this could be it. We won't offer any salary hikes or comfy office, but we offer a great role with full ownership and grow with the company.

Roles
- Increase customer acquisition through Online and Offline marketing
- Strong experience towards Digital Marketing
- Bring in new ideas and execute them
- Tracking and managing marketing campaigns
- Sell the product with positioning not with discounts
- Create a buzz around the brand Shortfundly
- Scaling the marketing team along with business requirements

Requirements
- Worked on B2C brand before in marketing
- Examples of successful marketing campaigns executed
- Managed teams and interacted across levels
- Knowledge of Tamil and/or other Southern Languages would be a plus

Lets us know in 3 to 5 lines, why you are a Superstar “Marketer” in your email to be considered. Mail to support@shortfundly.com.

Skills
Marketing, Branding, Product Marketing, Sales and Marketing, Digital Marketing, Marketing and Branding, Marketing & Branding, Marketing Management, Digital Marketing and Branding

Data Driven SEO Specialist at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

We are looking for a SEO specialist to join the Shortfundly crew!

You will have the opportunity to work across our web products including a video platform for audience and a content management system for creators. We looking to experiment on new engagement & retention techniques – so that will be something exciting & fun! Your work will touch the lives of millions, and spread awesome shortfilm from india to the world.

General Skills:

Administer search engine programs (XML sitemaps, webmaster tools) for purposes of diagnostic reporting

Working with research tools such as Woorank, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Moz Analytics, Google Analytics and Webmaster tools

Develop relationships with bloggers, webmaster & build organic links

Develop and execute link building strategy; optimize links for search relevance and implement link building programs/tactics

Develop/execute SEO strategies to achieve and maintain top rankings on major search engines

Assist in development and execution of communication/content strategies via social communities in coordination with SEO goals

Keep pace with SEO, search engine, social media and internet marketing industry trends and developments

Forming processes for teamwork involving social, copywriting, and development resource

Experience – 0 to 2 years

Qualification – Doesn’t matter

Perks of working at Shortfundly

– Watching video/ short films/ viral content is part of the job
– Interacting with filmmakers/ artists/ models is part of the job
– Discussing film stories/ brainstorming on scripts/ creating videos is part of the job
Benefits & Culture
– Flexible hours
– Professional Development
– Small team where everyone is valued

If you are interested , forward your resume to info@shortfundly.com with a brief paragraph summarizing your skill set and experience along with a portfolio of the work you believe is relevant. Send Your Linkedin profile, It’s mandatory.

Skills
SEM, SEO, SEO/SEM, Search, Search Engine Optimization, SEO and Marketing Services, Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Digital Marketing, Digital Optimization Including SEO, SEO and Internet Markeitng, Google Analytics, Google Adwords, Google AdSense, Analtyics, Google Adwords and Analytics, SEO and Website Analytics, Ahrefs, MOZ Tools, WooRank, SEMRush

Looking for Marketing guy with creative bent at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. Marketing
c. Startup culture
Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different short film categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the short film festival circuit. We are planning for big expansions in the future into other languages. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

Qualification – Doesn’t matter

Experience – 0 to 2 years in sales/ marketing/ script writing/ video making

Location – Any location

Perks of working at Shortfundly

– Watching video/ short films/ viral content is part of the job

– Interacting with filmmakers/ artists/ models is part of the job

– Salary with an ESOP component to the tune of 0.5% to 1.00%.

– Discussing film stories/ brainstorming on scripts/ creating videos is part of the job

:)

Role and Responsibilities:

We need to put our marketing efforts to bring shortfilm makers to our platform
Getting partnership to publish shortfilm in our platfrom through film institute in india.
One more thing, getting shortfilm festival event organizing people to our platform and help them to organize their festival super easy.
Skills – marketing / script writing/ video making

Why you should join:

To learn marketing, get chance to meet all film celebrity and grow your career at fast pace

Let’s change the experience of short film watching and sharing, together!

If you are interested, please write to: support@shortfundly.com with your brief self introduction, name and contact number. Share your linkedin profile.

Skills
Product Marketing, Brand Marketing, Marketing Management, Creative Content Generation - Brand Marketing

PR / Syndication Manager at Shortfundly

Chennai, Remote · Internship
Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.Read More

Shortfundly is an online media company that curates and shares the best short films and stories from india through our global multi-platform network. Our video and editorial platform enables a global audience to easily discover, watch and share unique stories from india anywhere on their desktop and mobile devices.

Our vision is to continually grow the community of short film audience to enable a wide and accessible market reach for short films and become the leading micro-cinema/shortfilm platform for india.

Applied
Apply to Shortfundly
Add a message to Shortfundly
Apply

Job Description

Shortfundly would be place for you, if you love the following in any particular order:
a. Movies
b. PR (press release activities) Brand building
c. Startup culture

Shortfundly.com is creating a digital revolution in Shortfilm Industry. The online shortfilm sharing portal (shortfundly) start collecting 22,000+ short films to different shortfilm categories from new age filmmakers. This portal will also use its contacts to promote the films in the shortfilm festival circuit. Shortfundly shares plenty of new films every day. We are planning for big expansions in the future into other languages. We are bootstrap company. So, you are not only part of team, you are part of the company.

The PR and content syndication role involves seeking and maintaining content partnerships with online publishers worldwide. You will also write press releases for our shortfundly, manage public relations with regional media and handle press engagements to promote our shortfundly further!

You will be working closely with the content team to curate and syndicate short films to external content and media partners.

You should have:

Passion for films and stories
Knowledge of online media and editorial trends
Good writing and communication skills
Creative and enthusiastic about learning
Prior experience in a PR role (preferably)
This role requires you to be based in Chennai

Experience – 0 to 2 years

Qualification – Doesn’t matter

Our team consists of folks of diverse experience and interests and we are keen to share our thoughts and learnings along the way as we chart new grounds. If you are interested, please write to: support@shortfundly.com with your brief self introduction, name and contact number. Share your linkedin profile.

Perks of working at Shortfundly

– Watching video/ short films/ viral content is part of the job

– Interacting with filmmakers/ artists/ models is part of the job

– Discussing film stories/ brainstorming on scripts/ creating videos is part of the job

items.content:
Company

Upingo facilitates one-to-one in-person networking opportunities for the London Startup community. The Founders have significant ambition for growth.

We are looking for an Undergraduate or recent Graduate who wants to join an early stage Startup with full responsibility for Marketing.

Who are we looking for?

We are seeking an enthusiastic, self-motivated team member to drive the growth of the platform. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to be awarded equity in the business (in the near term) and become a key part of the Founding Team.

Location

The candidate will work remotely, though it makes most sense to be based in London. Hours will be flexible, though the capacity to engage with the Founders within certain windows (to be agreed upon) will be important.

Role

-Architecting and executing the social media strategy for Upingo.

-Responsibility for planning and financial control of all digital marketing.

-Copywriting for customer email marketing, newsletters and social media.

-Review and analysis pay-per-click social media accounts.

-Architecting and executing digital and email marketing campaigns.

-Analysis of marketing effectiveness and carrying out A/B testing.

-General sector research and analysis.

Requirements

-Undergraduate or recent Graduate in a Marketing discipline (candidates with a different academic background should be able to demonstrate successful marketing projects or relevant independent study).

-Experience/strong understanding of current online marketing concepts, strategies and best practices. 

-Excellent communicator (fluent in English).

-Self-motivated and proactive.

Why work for Upingo?

This is a phenomenal opportunity for an Undergraduate or recent Graduate to put their learnings into practice in the real world. For the right candidate, an equity award (in the near term) is very possible and moreover, the opportunity to join an ambitious Startup, making a positive impact, at the earliest of stages.

Job Type: Part Time.

Salary: Unpaid, but good potential for equity award for the right candidate.

items.title: JavaScript developer for a new fintech product
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=8, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=3, nodejs=4, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=10, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=41}
items.content:
JavaScript developer for a new fintech product

Company: Vox Financial Partners
Belfast, United Kingdom

[Note: we are open to remote work if you can spend at least a few days a month in our Belfast office.]

THE ROLE
You’ll be the person responsible for building the front-ends to Opal, a cloud platform to create and manage Structured Documents: documents represented as data, created and managed programatically.

You'll be using JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS to make the user experience sing. We don’t want your typical ugly enterprise app: it has to be elegant, delightful to use, and enticing during a demo.

YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES
You’ll be doing some or all of the following:

  • working with our product manager to refine the UI/UX requirements
  • coding the front-end for the web and Office apps
  • writing some basic test packs. We won’t go overboard but we aren’t flying by the seat of our pants, either
  • in partnership with the CTO, the technical lead, and the rest of your team, defining and implementing standards for how we work: our agile methodology, coding standards, development tools, deployment practices, and more. This is a green field development and we want to use tomorrow’s best practices today.

WHO WE WANT
We are looking for a smart person with initiative and good judgment, who works well with others, and who will always look to balance the urgent needs of clients with the long-term technical architecture for our product.

You need to have:

  • a minimum of three years’ experience using client-side web technologies with a solid knowledge of HTML5 and CSS3
  • experience with Node JS, and webpack, as well as a unit testing framework such as Jest
  • a desire to learn new things. For example, we have a Ruby on Rails back-end, so there is an opportunity to become a full stack developer (if you want to).

Any of these things will help you stand out:

  • an eye for good design. You won’t be getting detailed wireframes, so your role will be at least partly that of a designer
  • experience with ReactJS, or a similar front-end library or framework
  • experience with Bootstrap or similar – we’ll be using Office Fabric, a similar library from Microsoft
  • working with RESTful API back-end components.

WHAT WE OFFER

As well as the basics - competitive pay and benefits – we offer work on a greenfield product, in a small startup-like team. We’ll invest so you have good tools to work with and we’ll keep your skills fresh with a budget for technical books, training, and the like.

Apply now

items.content:
Product Manager IoT // caresyntax

Company: caresyntax

Tags:
  • Product Management
  • Internet of Things
  • Embedded systems
  • IoT
  • roadmap

    • Internet of Things (IoT) product roadmapping in digital health

    Berlin, Germany

    Our technologies have raised the performance bar in more than 6,000 operating rooms worldwide, and are supporting the next generation of data-enabled OR teams in over 10 million procedures per year. Headquartered in Berlin and Boston, with over 90 employees from 20 different nationalities, and recently having raised over 10 million euros in our latest funding round, we seek highly-motivated and passionate individuals to join us.

    Your work scope

    • Source product and feature ideas from customers, competitors, sales team, your own know-how of technology trends (including in other industries) and your visionary thinking
    • Gain a deep understanding of customer experience and generate user and technical requirements as well as use case scenarios
    • Research and test for viability of the product in the market and profitability
    • Coordinate IoT development team in an agile development mode
    • Lead relationships with component suppliers
    • Create a long-term strategy for the product’s evolution in the market
    • Scope and prioritize features based on strategic objectives, business and customer impact
    • Produce Product Marketing documents (e.g., product positioning, competitive analysis)
    • Establish the right business model for your products (e.g., Platform As a Service), define and iterate on pricing options
    • Support sales team with the necessary product knowledge and technical expertise

    Your background

    • Formal education or solid work experience in computer science, innovation management or other relevant technical domains
    • Proven skills and track record in software and/ or hardware product management in an IoT (start-up) environment
    • Strong ownership, entrepreneurial mindset and organisational skills
    • Creative and out-of-the-box thinker, strong sense of agency and accountability
    • Business-fluent English and at least conversational German

    Your benefits

    • Warm-hearted, flexible, and solution-oriented culture with open feedback culture
    • Flexible working times models, including remote working, home office, tandem positions, trust-based working times (where applicable)
    • Room to introduce and implement creative ideas and develop your talents with technical training and individualised continued education (e.g. languages DE/EN, leadership)
    • Professional and intellectual knowledge exchange with highly-talented and ambitious colleagues from all over the world
    • Work visa sponsorship and relocation assistance (where applicable)

    Could this be you? Would you like to work in a highly innovative and visionary environment, where technologies are developed that help to improve and save lives? Worldwide.

    Then please get in touch with us to discuss your career opportunities at caresyntax by S-Cape. Jacky Špalek takes your application and answers your questions under careers@caresyntax.com.

    Would you like to know more about caresyntax? Find us on Xing (https://www.xing.com/companies/s%C2%B7capegmbh), LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/company/502699/) and our company website (https://caresyntax.com/about/),  and join our digital health community!

    Apply for this position

items.title: PPC Advertising Content Writer
items.content:
Who We Are

The Urban Cowgirl provides competitive advertising strategies to the top 1% of Amazon Sellers. We create story-driven instructional courses to educate and empower Amazon Sellers to create successful Amazon Advertising campaigns. We are also a service business, partnering with our clients to scale their businesses and achieve their desired outcomes. We immerse ourselves in advanced advertising strategy.

Who You Are

You’re confident in your ability to write instructional advertising content with a strong voice and style. You’re a structured thinker and have experience writing step-by-step, detailed explanations of technical processes. In this position, you’ll be responsible for creating study guides, presentation slides, video scripts, and website content.

You have PPC Advertising experience and an understanding of advanced search marketing strategies. You’re interested in teaching others through engaging written content. You have the ability to work effectively as part of a team, take direction, and deliver assets on deadline in a fast-paced environment.

 

Responsibilities

  • Create digital written content that is bold, strategic, and on-brand
  • Translate complex ideas into effective written content
  • Research, author, and publish outstanding content under tight deadlines
  • Create and manage content for social media channels
  • Collaborate with the creative team remotely via Slack and email

 

Requirements:

  • 2+ years experience writing and publishing digital advertising content
  • Strong writing, editing, and proofreading skills
  • Technical and instructional writing skills
  • Advanced understanding of PPC Advertising
  • Advanced understanding of creating and optimizing PPC advertising campaigns
  • Experience creating multiple drafts and refining your work to achieve excellence
  • Working knowledge of Adobe InDesign, or strong ability to learn software basics
  • Experience collaborating with creative teams of 3 or more people
  • Strong time management and organization skills
  • Critical thinking skills to generate original and innovative ideas
  • Skilled at identifying challenges and proactively creating solutions
  • Digital storytelling and content creation experience a plus

 

Essential Software Experience:

  • Adobe InDesign (1+ years)
  • Google Drive (1+ years)
  • Microsoft Word (5+ years)
  • Powerpoint (5+ years)
  • Keynote (5+ years)

 

The Urban Cowgirl values loyalty and hard work. We’re committed to creating great work experiences for our team with opportunities for advancement.

items.title: Digital Marketing Manager
items.content:
Introduction

This is an opportunity to fill a much needed role that hasn’t yet existed at Apolitical and have significant impact on the team.

In this role, you will be a powerful amplifier for Apolitical’s work, leveraging resources across the company to get the word out about us and drive a key success metric for the company: network membership growth. You will be responsible for two levers that drive membership growth:

1) Optimising our presence in google searches – the way that most potential users find us and join.

2) PR and marketing around specific growth campaigns and pieces of content produced by the team to maximise their impact for user growth and sales.

You will manage a team on link building and work widely across the company to bring together activity relating to membership growth – and translate it into an effective digital strategy for Apolitical across online search, social media, email communications, and our distribution partners.

You will be analytical and driven by measuring and responding to success metrics of the campaigns and outreach activities you conduct, so that we continuously focus on the most impactful growth channels as a company.



Key responsibilities:

SEO:
Hit monthly targets for improvements in Apolitical’s search performance as a critical lever of membership growth, a critical company priority.
Manage a team of interns as an effective sales function to execute Apolitical’s SEO strategy.
Work with the rest of the Apolitical team to make our existing work optimal for search.

Digital content PR opportunities:
Develop and execute a strategy to leverage the company’s content, community, and growth initiatives to maximise publicity amongst relevant potential users and partners.
Develop and maintain partnerships with the whole range of press, networks, and organisations that are effective distribution partners for Apolitical’s content.

Digital growth ringleader:
Work across and coordinate initiatives across relevant teams to maximise the impact of any activity in the company for our membership growth and engagement.



Key attributes:

Must haves:
Autonomous and self sufficient – some prior management experience
Organised and efficient
Data drive and analytical – with a desire to experiment, measure and assess the effectiveness of communication strategies, and an appreciation for success indices
A desire to expand and develop a career in digital marketing and growth
Creativity, enthusiasm and a passion for Apolitical’s mission
Proven experience of using digital channels to build profile, from more traditional routes of selective content placement through to running online campaigns and using distribution partners
An excellent written and verbal communicator
Able to work effectively through other teams and get buy into your strategy
A hustler and do-er – being willing to roll up your sleeves to execute on your strategies


Strongly preferred:
Prior SEO experience and knowledge and communications
Experience of working in the policy space (govt, think tanks, NGOs, foundations etc)


Salary: Between £30- 40k depending on experience

Application: Please note that all applicants must have a right to work in the UK.

items.title: Clevertech: Sr. Route Optimization Engineer
items.content:
Sr. Route Optimization Engineer

Company: Clevertech
Headquarters: Remote
https://www.clevertech.biz/

DESCRIPTION

Clevertech is looking for a Senior route optimization Engineer to join our global team. This role has implementation and troubleshooting responsibilities including handling constraints that change on the fly, utilize self-learning tools based on past data, and sharing results in clean interfaces.

REQUIREMENTS

  • You love doing puzzles
  • You have serious math skills
  • You've optimized your keyboard shortcuts
  • You've written and presented in front of a room that resulted in clapping
  • You are able to travel inside both inside the US and out for client meetings

BENEFITS

Own Your Time
We are a completely remote team. That means we have a large amount of trust and a lot of flexibility. World travelers, young parents, nature lovers, and commute avoiders love working here. We also will pay for a co-working space in case you feel like working outside of your normal setting.

Recharge Time
We insist that you take recharge time. We are closed for major holidays and then require that you take at least two weeks a year to refresh.

Care For Yourself
You’ll receive a health/wellness monthly stipend that goes towards covering medical insurance, dental insurance or joining a gym!

Focused Work
You will work together on a dedicated team with your eye on one finish line at a time. Our teams are nimble and agile, and cover the technical range you would expect in world class product delivery teams.

Learn at your edges
We believe in learning and provide unique programs that improve your tech skills, leadership skills and even challenge you in personal development. CleverFridays, guest speakers, mentorship opportunities and in-depth industry exposure are all on offer here. And of course, if you speak at a tech conference, we cover all expenses.

Clevertech Swag
And keep your eye on the mail - we send out swag everywhere in the world and there are celebratory pictures of Clevertech socks, hoodies, and mugs all over Slack.

Want to learn more about Clevertech and the team? Check out clevertech.careers.
Clevertech Culture Video

Apply for this position

tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=8, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=5, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Long Term Blogger for SEO/Linkbuilding SaaS Blog

Company: Monitor Backlinks
Location: Remote

Job Type: Freelance

Description

Monitor Backlinks is exactly what it sounds like—a tool to monitor your site's backlinks (+ competitor backlinks) along with other important SEO metrics: https://monitorbacklinks.com

We're hiring expert writers to share in-depth knowledge of SEO, backlinks and linkbuilding strategies on our blog: blog.monitorbacklinks.com.

This is not a ghostwriting position. You'll get full credit for your work, including a short bio (with a personal link) at the end of your post.

Payment is done via PayPal on the 14th each month (we will pay for the fees).

We're looking for writers who can:

  • dig deep into SEO/link-building topics and provide tons of valuable information and insights — beyond the basics, no fluff
  • capture the "friendly expert" voice and bring personality and humor to dry topics
  • write 2-4 blog posts per month
  • work in WordPress and our content marketing platform (CoSpot)

If you’re interested and you do an outstanding job, this can even develop into a part-time or full-time writing or editing position.

To Apply

If you’re interested, please send an email to editors [ at ] monitorbacklinks [ dot ] com and:

  • describe your experience with SEO/link-building
  • send 2-3 relevant writing samples (URLs of published blog posts preferred)
  • mention 2-3 headlines of blog posts you think might work on our blog.
  • tell us your competitive rate per 1200-word blog post
  • tell us if you're interested in editing work! (we're actively looking for a good editor to join us part time or full time)

Application Instructions

Send us an email per the application instructions above.

Digital Analytics Consultant / Google Analytics at InfoTrust

Cincinnati, United States, Remote · Full Time
InfoTrust is a Marketing Technology company that helps some of the largest brands in the world build measurement architectures to track what their visitors do online. Why is this important? As they say, “data is the new oil” and digital analytics is one of the critical sources of data that allows organizations to make better decisions about advertising, merchandising, user experience, etc.Read More

InfoTrust is a Marketing Technology company that helps some of the largest brands in the world build measurement architectures to track what their visitors do online. Why is this important? As they say, “data is the new oil” and digital analytics is one of the critical sources of data that allows organizations to make better decisions about advertising, merchandising, user experience, etc.

With two offices (Cincinnati and Dubai), InfoTrust is rapidly growing through its work with some of the largest multinational brands in the world as well as Internet Retailer 1000 companies in North America. Google has recognized InfoTrust with the following certifications – Google Analytics Certified Partner, Google Analytics Premium Reseller and Google Tag Manager Specialist.

InfoTrust is now a four time finalist in Greater Cincinnati’s Best Places to Work (2012, 2013, 2014, 2015). We are also recognized by Inc. Magazine as one of the fastest growing companies in the country.

InfoTrust just moved into an amazing new office with lots of sun and open space, sit/stand desks, ping-pong, and daily catered lunch. Our team of web analytics experts have been continuously recognized among the world analytics elite.

We are currently looking for a technologist who is interested in becoming an expert in analytics and digital marketing. If you’re a person who loves technical challenges, learning how things work, looking over code, debugging javascript, and building scalable systems for some of largest websites in the world this will be an ideal role for you. Not only do we work with cutting edge technology, but we work beyond the cutting edge, with access to technologies that are not available to the general public. We are looking for people for whom being first in the world to play with new technology, even before public beta, and potentially coming up with architectures for huge household brands is exciting. If you are one of those people – contact us.

Applied
Apply to InfoTrust
Add a message to InfoTrust
Apply

Job Description

Rocketship -- that is the word that was used to explain what it is like to join InfoTrust at this time. We have done all the prep, we have build this amazing architecture for success (the ship) not we are getting ready to launch? Are you ready to board?

We are currently looking for a DIGITAL ANALYTICS CONSULTANT who is an expert in analytics and digital marketing.

The Digital Analytics Consultant role will be responsible for client management, advanced implementations of Google Analytics, auditing and troubleshooting existing configurations, and reporting analysis to improve clients’ digital marketing initiatives.

You will work closely with web analytics engineer/architect to develop custom tagging and measurement systems.

Responsibilities:

- Identifying client objectives and mapping suitable analytics solutions, ensuring that all required performance data can be reliably tracked and reported
- Advanced Google Tag Manager architecture and setup of complex tracking scripts
- Producing analytics audit reports for corrective or advanced Google Analytics tracking and data collection architecture
- Performing ad-hoc analytics consultancies for clients and documenting the work
– Delivering analytics audit reports to clients and presenting findings in person or via conference calls
- Representing the InfoTrust team in client meetings and presentations, providing technical analytics input
- Assisting in educating clients on the importance of online measurement & providing best practice guidance for technical aspects of analytics
- Providing training to clients ranging from product training for marketing teams to implementation training for technical teams
- Providing consultancy on campaign tagging and providing consultancy on campaign tagging and additional on-site tracking
- Providing guidance to data analysts to produce marketing dashboards via Google Drive, Excel and various APIs

Requirements

We are looking for someone the possess our core values and is looking for a place to drive impact, provide superior client support with GA and is looking for learn and grow as an individual and share that knowledge to drive the company towards continued success. The Senior Consultant would be expected to have the following background to be successful:

- Experience working with clients in a consulting role
- Well versed in Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager -- from developing client specific implementation plans, to overseeing the implementation and assisting them to identify key ways to improve their marketing initiatives based on the good clean data that InfoTrust will provide.
- Proven experience as a team player -- You enjoy working in a fun and collaborative culture and are willing to take initiative!

We are looking for someone in Cincinnati, Ohio. Ask why Cincinnati might be a great option to relocate to -- we are happy to brag about our city!

We would be willing to consider remote (experienced) workers, just let us know why you are great at working remotely.

Must be authorized to work for any US employer.

Skills
Javascript, Web Analytics, Consulting, Client Management, Google Analytics, • Google Analytics and Google Webmaster Tools, Google Tag Manager, Client Education, Google data studio
Compensation
$72K–$86K
No Equity
Visa Sponsorship
Available

Marketing Internship - Young Talent Program at Teach Me Now And EdTechSolutions.org

Dubai, Remote · Internship
Our mission is to make the world a better place through education.Read More

Our mission is to make the world a better place through education.

How?

Our vision is to improve accessibility through modern technology.

Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to help us create the next big thing. Help us shake up the scene using your strengths and bring new ideas to the table.

We are a dynamic young startup based out of Dubai, looking to grow the family. Be a part of this exciting phase and grow something that is growing fast.

About the team: We are result driven, value being practical, our work environment is flexible, and we are all very ambitious. Are you someone who wants to create something amazing, be empowered and are hands on?

Who we are? At Teach Me Now, we are an international mix that have passions for things like rollerblading, argentine tango, intellectual debates and indulging in amazing food at the office.

We are looking for people who dare to be different and want to be a part of something that help change the way the world learns.

Applied
Apply to Teach Me Now And EdTechSolutions.org
Add a message to Teach Me Now And EdTechSolutions.org
Apply

Job Description

To celebrate new ideas and foster innovation we are launching the Young Talent Program. Our mission is to make the world a better place through education.

How? To improve accessibility through modern technology.

Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to help us create the next big thing in education and shake up the scene using your strengths and bring new ideas to the table.  

Our rigorous program provides you with the opportunity of taking the lead and develop skills in the following:

Month 1: Market and Business Development

You will conduct market research; strategies international marketing plans, use in-depth analytical tools and structure your processes.

Month 2: Digital Marketing

This month will focus on social media marketing and lead generation. This is understanding more than just likes and virality but also engagement, content creation, media planning, strategy and SEO optimisation. Creating a strategy and testing what works. Learn fast, fail fast.

Month 3:  Product Development

In Tech, product development, testing and iteration is key. Be a part of the process and help bring the product to life. You will be a part of testing, feedback data analysis, and more.

Opportunity for a Full-time Position:

Upon the completion of the program, successful candidates are up for the possibility of full time hire and being part of the core team and can focus on one of the three categories.

Requirements:
1. University Degree (Completed or Currently Pursuing)
2. Fluent in English (Additional Language is a plus)
3. International experiences or exposure
4. Passion for education and technology

Technical Competencies:

1. Eagerness to make a difference and stimulate change
2. Courage to challenge the status quo and persistence to succeed and achieve challenging tasks.
3. Analytical and love data!

Communication:

The ability to plan and deliver communication in a persuasive and tactful way. You must be fluent in English.

To Apply:

Send your CV and cover letter to hr@teachmenow.com. You need to tell us why you want to work with us.

Early applications are preferred. Full time job offer will be considered after the internship is complete.

Skills
User Experience Design, Social Media Marketing, Market Research, Sales and Marketing, Software

Creating educational software and at the same time hosting a global marketplace for one to one learning - where anyone can teach and everyone can learn.

Teach Me Now is our public facing website and marketplace, where we have teachers/ tutors and students learning around the world. The goal is:

Through EdTechSolutions.org and in our second phase is licensing this software to schools and educational systems, to become more than just an LMS or storage provider. We help them become an online school and sell their expertise online.

Future phases have many exciting plans. Be a part of something exciting and new, and that will have an impact on generations to come.
